verbs.description: Trump [V: has] repeatedly claimed that a spy was placed in his campaign for " political purposes , " an accusation for which no evidence is publicly available .
[ARG0: Trump] has [ARGM-MNR: repeatedly] [V: claimed] [ARG1: that a spy was placed in his campaign for " political purposes , " an accusation for which no evidence is publicly available] .
Trump has repeatedly claimed that a spy [V: was] placed in his campaign for " political purposes , " an accusation for which no evidence is publicly available .
Trump has repeatedly claimed that [ARG1: a spy] was [V: placed] [ARG2: in his campaign] [ARGM-PRP: for " political purposes] , " an accusation for which no evidence is publicly available .
Trump has repeatedly claimed that a spy was placed in his campaign for " political purposes , " an accusation for which [ARG1: no evidence] [V: is] [ARG2: publicly available] .
